title: List of municipalities in Alabama
summary: Alabama is a state located in the Southern United States. According to the 2020 United States Census, Alabama is the 24th most populous state with 5,024,279 inhabitants and the 28th largest by land area spanning 50,645.33 square miles (131,170.8Â km2) of land.[1] Alabama is divided into 67 counties and contains 461 incorporated municipalities consisting of 174 cities and 287 towns.[2] These cities and towns cover only 9.6% of the state's land mass but are home to 60.4% of its population.[1]
